recipe.title: Vanilla Ice Cream with Sesame Candies and Halvah
ingredients: *Sesame candies (such as Joyva's Sesame Crunch) and halvah (a Middle Eastern sweet) are available at some supermarkets and a Middle Eastern markets.
instructions: Start by placing sesame candies in a large resealable plastic bag. Crush the candies with a rolling pin until broken into small pieces. Divide ice cream among 6 bowls. Top with crushed candy and crumbled halvah. Drizzle with honey.
